Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Irving Park/Elston
ShortDescription: Eastbound 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Pulaski, Montrose, Kimball and Irving Park due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Pulaski, Montrose, Kimball and Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Elston.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
